mapper.sql: id, mobile, age, sex, user_name, pass_word, id_card, identify_status
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, mobile, age, sex, user_name, pass_word, id_card, identify_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mobile,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{identifyStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into user
id,
mobile,
age,
sex,
user_name,
pass_word,
id_card,
identify_status,

mapper.update:
update user
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=BIGINT},
age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=BIGINT},
identify_status = #{identifyStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
